body:
NOTE Premier Support for Oracle Verrazzano Enterprise Container Platform will end on October 31, 2024, as documented at https://www.oracle.com/us/assets/lifetime-support-middleware-069163.pdf. After that date, Oracle Verrazzano will remain in Sustaining Support indefinitely. There will be no further releases, updates, or fixes. For more details, see My Oracle Support Note 2794708.1.  The timeline for Verrazzano releases and the date of their end of error correction.
   Verrazzano Release Date Latest Patch Release Latest Patch Release Date End of Error Correction     1.7 2023-10-18 1.7.2 2024-08-12 2024-10-31   1.6 2023-06-28 1.6.12 2024-08-12 2024-10-31   1.5 2023-02-15 1.5.7 2023-09-25 2024-02-28   1.4 2022-09-30 1.4.8 2023-09-25 2023-10-31   1.3 2022-05-24 1.3.8 2022-11-17 2023-05-31   1.2 2022-03-14 1.2.2 2022-05-10 2022-11-30   1.1 2021-12-16 1.1.2 2022-03-09 2022-09-30   1.0 2021-08-02 1.0.4 2021-12-20 2022-06-30
